name: Riptide Client
short_description:
This is a portion of the Riptide client. These are all the necessary projects that encompass making the default skin.

The Riptide Server and the core of the Riptide Client are close source (for security). The core will know which skin to load the corresponding plugins (*.dll) files from.

Anybody may make their own skins (or modify the default ones) in any way they choose. One must just reference the Riptide Framework in order to make the *.dll files for their skin. Use the default skin projects here as a reference.

Any new skin MUST provide a Login.dll and UI.dll. Without these, the Riptide Client core will revert back to the default skin.

*The Framework will be available once the initial project is started*
summary: Default client skin for the Riptide CCG/TCG
